title: Subject Guides: Communicable Diseases: COVID-19
author: Darcie Smith
description: General & Emerging Information on Communicable Diseases including Monkeypox & COVID-19
cleaned_text: Request a [Literature Search](https://nhalibrary.libguides.com/libraryhome/services) 250-565-2152 or 250-565-2219 Visit Vaccines — Immunity, Variants, Boosters](https://www.nejm.org/doi/full/10.1056/NEJMra2206573) - New England Journal of Medicine - 2022 PubMed: COVID-19 Vaccines (MeSH Mjr) AND Clinical Query Filter for Therapy/Broad The library's resources are best accessed when you are working onsite at Northern Health locations. You can also use your VPN connection for easier access.
